name: Connoils By Kraft - Bulk Organic Plant Sterol Oil & Powder
description: Connoils By Kraft is a leading international supplement manufacturer, distributor, and wholesale supplier of Bulk Organic Plant Sterol Oil & Oil Powder. Phytosterols function as plant-derived cholesterol alternatives that support barrier function. Bulk orders available with organic options for natural and clean beauty formulations.
certifications.description: Connoils By Kraft is a leading international supplement manufacturer offering bulk organic plant sterol oil and oil powder. These phytosterols serve as natural cholesterol alternatives for barrier repair formulations, providing barrier support and anti-inflammatory benefits. Available in bulk with organic options.
products: Bulk Organic Plant Sterol Oil Powder
certifications.notes: Leading international supplement manufacturer with bulk capabilities. Organic options available for natural/organic formulations. Both oil and powder forms provide formulation flexibility. Bulk focus suitable for large-scale manufacturers.

Their phytosterols serve as plant-derived cholesterol alternatives for barrier repair applications, with bulk orders and organic options available.
products: Bulk Organic Plant Sterol Oil Powder
certifications.notes: Leading international supplement manufacturer with bulk wholesale capabilities. Organic options available for clean beauty formulations. notes: Leading international supplement manufacturer and wholesale supplier. Specializes in bulk organic plant sterols available in both oil and powder forms. Phytosterols serve as plant-derived cholesterol alternatives for barrier repair with additional anti-inflammatory benefits. Organic certification appeals to natural cosmetics market. Bulk ordering capabilities suitable for medium to large-scale production.
